data.actual_result: Logs in, shows "Invalid code" message too
data.expected_result: Logs in with no error message
data.short_description: Entering 2FA code and hitting on the enter button will show error notification even after logging in
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter email and password for a 2FA-secured account - Enter 2FA code's last digit - Hit the enter key on your keyboard as fast as possible - Note: The app automatically checks the code's validity as soon as its last digit entered, leaving a small window for the user to also press any other keys on the keyboard. When no other keys are pressed, this bug does not occur.
